FuncDef: This command configures the MBS for the QoS policer.

ParaDef.Info: This required parameter specifies that the MBS is expressed as an integer representing the required size in either bytes or kilobytes. The default is kilobytes. The optional byte and kilobyte keywords are mutually exclusive and are used to explicitly to define the size. By specifying the keyword default sets the MBS to its default value. Values-0 to 16777216, default.
Specifies that the value given for size is interpreted as the queue'sMBS value in bytes.
Specifies that the value given for size is interpreted as the queue's MBS value in kilobytes.
